title: Cultural Heritage Event Dataset (CHEV) - Article-Based Version
description: Dataset recording newspaper articles that potentially report damage to cultural heritage sites in countries experiencing armed conflict or unrest. The unit of observation is a newspaper article. The dataset includes metadata about the article (e.g., publication date, source) and the full text of the article body.

article_id.description: Unique ID for each newspaper article

article_date.description: Publication date of the newspaper article (in YYYY-MM-DD format)

article_source.description: Name of the news source/publication (e.g., The Guardian, Reuters, New York Times)

article_body.description: The entire text of the body of the newspaper article
